rows.en: This is the toplevel instance for logging data.
rows.de: Dies ist die Toplevel-Instanz fÃ¼r das Daten-Logging.

rows.en: In this task, comparison and creation of entries is done.
rows.de: In dieser Task werden EintrÃ¤ge verglichen und angelegt.

rows.en: In this task, writing to storage is done.
rows.de: In dieser Task wird auf das Speichermedium geschrieben.

rows.en: These modules sort the data log entries.
FALSE: Variables stored by this channel are not logged.
rows.de: FALSE: Variablen dieses Kanals werden nicht gelogged.

rows.en: Data is written only if the buffer has reached a fill level according to this specification in percent. A value of 0 deactivates buffering.
